law.catch_line: To enter a place or establishment in which a person is required to have an identification badge or i...

text.section:
To enter a place or establishment in which a person is required to have an identification badge or identification card under § 9-704 of this subtitle, a person may not willfully:
make unauthorized use of an identification badge or identification card; or
assist another in the unauthorized use of an identification badge or identification card.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 90 days or a fine not exceeding $500 or both.
